Title: Relates to authorizing the New York city transit authority to provide a minimum twenty-five percent discount on mass transit for college students
Summary: Authorizes the New York city transit authority to contract with mass transit entities including the Long Island Rail Road and the Metro-North Commuter Railroad Company to provide a minimum twenty-five percent discount for college students.
LawCode: Amd ยง1266, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to providing a reduced fare on the metropolitan transportation authority transit system
